29.2. [Hrabanus Maurus] Commentariorum in Genesim.
Commentary | Genesis
Manuscripts:
1. Bologna, Biblioteca Universitaria 646 (1191). saec. xiii.
2. Cambridge, University Library 1007 (Ee III 51), f. 1r-114vb. saec. xiii. Attributed to Hrabanus in MS. Hrabanus Frechulfo. No Capitula. No source marks. With Hrabanus on Maccabees and Acts. (S)*
3. Cambridge, Trinity College 47 (B 2.4), f. 1vb-112rb. saec. xii. Canterbury. Attributed to Hrabanus in MS. Hrabanus Frechulfo. No Capitula. With Walahfrid on Exodus, etc. (S). *
4. Châlons-sur-Marne, Bibliothèque municipale 67 (75), f. 1-88. saec. xii3/4. O: St. Denis (?); P: Châlons, St. Pierre. Attributed to Hrabanus in MS. Hrabanus Frechulfo. No Capitula. Followed by Gregory of Nazianzus, Apologeticum.*
5. Florence, Biblioteca Medicea Laurenziana Amiatinus 3, f. 2va-73. saec. xi. Attributed to Hrabanus in MS. Hrabanus Frechulfo. Capitula. With Hrabanus De Praedestinatione ad Noting and de Praedestinatione ad Hebeardum. (S)
6. Göttweig, Stiftsbibliothek 47 (40), f. 3vb-147r. saec. xii; O: S.Germany. Attributed to Hrabanus in MS. Frechulfus Hrabano. Hrabanus Frechulfo. Capitula.*
7. Grenoble, Bibliothèque municipale 266 (43), f. 1-63. saec. xii. *
8. Grenoble, Bibliothèque municipale 267 (346), f. 3-128. saec. xiii. *
9. Karlsruhe, Landesbibliothek Aug. perg. xlix, p. 1-103. saec. x. Reichenau. Incomplete: II, ch. 6- IV, ch. 18 only. No attribution in MS. No letters. No Capitula. Followed by Hrabanus on Exodus. (S) *
10. Leipzig, Stadtbibliothek 180 (Rep. II 55), f. 1-116. saec. xii. On Gen. 1,20-50,25. (S) *
11. Lille, Bibliothèque de l’Université 108 (1047)). 152 ff. saec. xii.
12. Liverpool, Public Library 091 RAB, f. 1-104. saec. xii mid. Peterborough.
13. Madrid, Biblioteca Nacionale 102 (254; B 5), f. 1ra-47va. saec. xiv. (S) *
[14. Metz, Bibliothèque Municipale 213, saec. x; P: St.-Arnoul.  Also contains Deuteronomy.]
15. Milan, Biblioiteca Ambrosiana I 35 inf., f. 1-160. saec. x.. Incomplete at the end*.
16. Munich, Bayerische Staatsbibliothek Clm. 6260, f. 1r-158v. saec. ix2. O-P: Freising. Attributed to Hrabanus in MS. Frechulfus Hrabano. Hrabanus Frechulfo Capitula. (S)*
17. Oxford, Ashmolean Museum 1516, f. 1ra-64vb. saec. xii. Attributed to Hrabanus in MS. Followed by Walahfrid on Exodus.*
18. Oxford, Bailliol College 167, f. 3-80. saec. xiii.
19. Oxford, New College xxix, f. 1-92. saec. xiii. Followed by Walahfrid on Exodus. *
20. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 2424 (Colbert 1005, Reg. 3812.1), f. 1va-111va. saec xii ex. Attributed to Hrabanus in MS. Hrabanus Frechulfo. No Capitula. Followed by Hrabanus on Exodus. (S)
21. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 13188, f. 1r-16v. saec. xii. St.Germain-des-Pres. Incomplete: all after line 835 wanting. No attribution in MS. No letters. No Capitula. Followed by Hrabanus on Exodus. (S) *
22.  Perugia, Biblioteca Capitolare 3 (Dominicini 30), f. 146r-215r. saec. xi-xii.
23. Saint-Mihiel, 25, f. 1r-74v. saec. x. Benedictines. No attribution in MS. Variant version of the text. (S) *
24. Toronto, Bergendal 108 (37), f. 1-101. saec. xii ex; Italy.
25. Tours, Bibliothèque municipale 69, f. 1rb-51v. saec. xi. No attribution in MS. Hrabanus Frechulfo. No Capitula. *
26. Tours, Bibliothèque municipale 70, f. 3rb-53va. saec. xii. Attributed to Hrabanus in MS. Hrabanus Frechulfo. Capitula (version 2). Followed by Hrabanus on Exodus.*
27. Troyes, Bibliothèque municipale 64, f. 1va-87ra. saec. xii. Clairvaux. *
28. Troyes, Bibliothèque muncipale 1557, f. 2r-81. saec. xi. No attribution in MS. No letters. No Capitula. (S)
29. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica Reg. lat. 91, f. 3ra-84va. saec. ix/x. Attributed to Hrabanus in MS. Frechulfus Hrabano. Hrabanus Frechulfo. Capitula, chapter numbers, source marks. Followed by Florus of Lyons against John Scotus. (S) *
 Fragments:
1. Arezzo, Archivio di Stato  I.24a.saec. ix2/4. O: Tours. Book IV, ch. IV-VIII (626A-644B)
2. Arezzo, Archivio di Stato I.24b. saec. ix2/4. O: Tours. Book IV, ch. XIII-XV (PL 653D-661D)
3. Darmstadt. Hessische Landesbibliothek 4108. saec. ix1. O: Fulda?
4. Kronungen- Oberwerrn (Unterfranken), Pfarrarchiv. Fragment. saec. ix.
5. Leipzig Universitätsbibliothek, Unsig. saec. ix1. O: Fulda ?
6. Würzburg. Franziskanerklosters I.9. Fragment. saec ix1. Fulda. Destroyed during World War II. Descr.: P. Lehmann, "Mitteilungen aus Handschriften," Sitzungberichte der Bayerische Akademische der wissenschaft, phil.-hist. Abteilung 1929, p. 55. P. Ludger Meier, O.F.M., "Aufzeichnungen aus vernichten Handschriften des Würzburger minoritenkloster," Archivum Franciscanum Historicum XLIV (1951): 191-209.
7. Würzburg. Stadtarchiv 1482/3. Fragment. 838-840. Fulda. Descr.: Josef Hofmann, "Fragmente von Bibelkommentaren des Hrabanus Maurus," Würzburger Diözesangescichtsblätter 18/19 (1956-57), p. 5-19, esp. 7-12.
Library catalogues:
1. Fulda, saec. xvi. no. 132.
2. Fulda, saec. xvi, no 136: Rabanus in Genesim. P. In principio fecit Deus coelum et terram. Principium autem refertur ad tempus, aut ad numerum, aut ad fundamentum.
Bibliography:
1. Edwards, Burton Van Name, “The Commentary on Genesis attributed to Walahfrid Strabo. A Preliminary Report from the Manuscripts,” Proceedings of the Patristic, Medieval and Renaissance Conference, Villanova University 15 (1996), 71-89.
2.Tristano, C., "Un nuovo testimone dei Commentaria in Genesim di Rabano Mauro,” Studi medievali ser. 3, Anno LI (2010), 839-891.
